Test case Name: Exchange Rate mandatory when USD selected
Description: Verify Exchange Rate is mandatory when currency USD is selected.
Actions:
Positive scenario:
1. Login to EZDocs Application and take D&O submission.
2. Select Product as Public from Product Dropdown.
3. Select USD from Currency Dropdown.
4. Leave Exchange Rate field blank.
5. Fill other mandatory details and click Proceed.
6. Observe validation popup.

Negative scenario:
1. Login to EZDocs Application and take D&O submission.
2. Select Product as Public from Product Dropdown.
3. Select USD from Currency Dropdown.
4. Enter a valid Exchange Rate (e.g., 1.25).
5. Fill other mandatory details and click Proceed.
6. Verify navigation proceeds to next page without validation error.
Expected Results:
Positive: The system displays a validation popup with the message: Please fill exchange rate before proceeding. The user cannot proceed until Exchange Rate is provided.

Negative: When a valid Exchange Rate is provided, the system proceeds to the next page and no validation popup is shown.
